verses.name: Leviticus 18:25
verses.text: And the land is defiled: therefore I do visit the iniquity thereof upon it, and the land itself vomiteth out her inhabitants.

verses.name: Leviticus 18:26
verses.text: Ye shall therefore keep my statutes and my judgments, and shall not commit any of these abominations; neither any of your own nation, nor any stranger that sojourneth among you:

verses.name: Leviticus 18:27
verses.text: (For all these abominations have the men of the land done, which were before you, and the land is defiled;)

verses.name: Leviticus 18:28
verses.text: That the land spue not you out also, when ye defile it, as it spued out the nations that were before you.
